Òtù Ndị Mmụta Alakụba nke mba South Afrika bụ ndị nnọchiteanya nke isi dị iche iche nke Òtù Ndị Mụta Alakụbaa (MSA) nke enwere ike ịchọta na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche dị elu na South Africa.

Òtù ụmụ akwụkwọ Alakụba siri ike nke mba South Afrịka (nke 1974), nke nwere alaka n'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu, ghọrọ obere olu ma si otú a tụfuo ikike ya na ọrụ ụmụ akwụkwọ; MSA si otú a dochie anya ndị otu Alakụba bụ ndị nweere onwe ha ma ọ bụ ndị mmekọ nke òtù ndị Alakụba ndị ọzọ na-abụghị ụlọ ọrụ ndị a
Òtù ụmụ akwụkwọ Alakụba nke afọ South Africa anọwo na-arụsi ọrụ ike ọzọ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya
E mere nzukọ mbụ nke National Muslim Students Association of South Africa (nke mbụ n'ime afọ 10 gara aga) na Durban na Jenụwarị na afọ 2004
Ndị nnọchi anya MSA si n'akụkụ niile nke mba ahụ zutere ebe a
A na-atụ anya na nke a ga-abụ ọdịnihu ọhụrụ nke ọrụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na mba ahụ.

A na-ahụ isi MSA ndị a na mba South Africa TUKS MSA - Mahadum Pretoria UCT MSA - University of Cape Town UKZN MSA - Jami'ar KwaZulu Natal UJ MSA - University of Johannesburg UWC MSA -University of the Western Cape US - University of Stellenbosch MSA RHODES - [Rhodes University - Grahamstown] PUKKE MSA - North West University - Potchefstroom Campus CPUT MSA - (Cape Peninsula University of Technology - (Bellville Campus)

A na-emekarị ogige kwa afọ na KwaZulu Natal ebe a na-akpọ ndị otu MSA niile gafee mba ahụ ka ha sonye na mkparịta ụka gbasara okwu metụtara MSA n'ozuzu ya, yana ikpuchi akụkụ nke idu ndú ndị Alakụba na mba South Africa.
The Message Magazine bụ ugbu a (2009) magazin ụmụ akwụkwọ mba, nke ndị otu MSA si n'ọtụtụ mahadum dị iche iche mepụtara ma bipụta
Ọ malitere (2001) dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa ọnwa site na MSA na Mahadum Natal - Durban ma Bilal Randeree na Mariam Jhaveri dezigharịrị ma mepụta ya
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2003, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ aghọwo magazin na-egbuke egbuke, ka na-emepụta na Durban, mana ya na ndị na-enye aka na nkesa na mba.
